name: Rainbow Restoration (AwesomeRedflare)
description:
Made in a week for GeoJam,

It's always been Square's dream to see what's on the other side of a rainbow, but all the colors of the rainbow have been scattered! Collect all seven of the color orbs and go to the rainbow, so Square can finally live his dream of going to the other side of a rainbow.

Controls:

Arrow keys or WASD to move.

Up arrow or Space to jump.

Objective: 

Collect all seven color orbs, and go to the rainbow to win.
